jcr:content.jcr:title: Adobe Audience Manager
jcr:content.browserTitle: Data management platform, DMP | Adobe Audience Manager
jcr:content.metaDescription: Adobe Audience Manager is a data management platform (DMP) that integrates online and offline data to deliver a unified view of all your audiences.

promo.productIntroText: Hear from Coca-Cola, Facebook, and more at Summit Online.

free.productIntroText: Hear from Coca-Cola, Facebook, and more at Summit Online.

paid.productIntroText: Hear from Coca-Cola, Facebook, and more at Summit Online.

mmarquee.text: Build audience profiles that you can use anywhere.

paid.productIntroText: Adobe Audience Manager helps businesses with GDPR readiness.

free.productIntroText: Adobe Audience Manager helps businesses with GDPR readiness.

promo.productIntroText: Adobe Audience Manager helps businesses with GDPR readiness.

text_f732.text:
What is Adobe Audience Manager?

It’s a data management platform (DMP) that helps you build unique audience profiles so you can identify your most valuable segments and use them across any digital channel.

text_2c1b.text:
Understand your audiences.
Get a complete view of your audience by combining all your data sources in one place.

text_999b.text:
Create new segments.

Continually discover and organize new, valuable segments for smarter targeting and personalization.

text_aa8e.text:
Advertise effectively.

Make your ad campaigns more productive by targeting specific segments on any platform.

text_71fe.text:
Princess Cruises charts a course for marketing excellence.

See how one of the world’s premier cruise lines creates timeless experiences by getting to know their audience.

title.title: See what Audience Manager can do.

text.text:
Use rules based on attributes like behavior and demographics to build niche audience segments.
Learn more about Segmentation ›

Conveniently target specific profiles on any content delivery platform.
Learn more about Activation ›

Use different reports to uncover insights about your audiences and to find new segments.
Learn more about Optimization ›

Connect your customers’ journey with your brand across all touchpoints, screens, and devices.
Learn more about Identity Management ›

Collect data about customers from every channel, and use it to improve and personalize their experience.
Learn more about Data Management ›

text_3b43.text:
Audience Manager for advertisers.

Advertisers can grow their revenue and customer base through unified, actionable views of their audiences. Combine attributes from all your data sources into high-value audience segments for ad targeting.

text_b880.text:
Audience Manager for publishers.

Publishers can sell advertisers their unique, targeted audiences — not just impressions. Identify the audience segments that are unique to your business.
Learn more about ad optimization ›

text_33cd.text: Use AI to find the right audience.

text_fd31.text: With the help of Adobe Sensei, your DMP finds valuable new audiences and estimates audience segment reach with high confidence.

text_b027.text: We keep up on the latest so you can, too.

text_da5c.text: Follow our blog to learn the latest thinking, strategies, and challenges when it comes to audience management. We’re finding the answers to the questions you’re asking.

text_726c.text: Visit our blog ›

text_c95.text: See how our customers use Audience Manager.

text_9338.text: See how this leading service provider improved their customer satisfaction scores by quickly getting optimized content to them.

text_8658.text: Learn more ›

text_5bb4.text: Understand how the worldwide publisher gets the right content to the right audience, no matter where they are.

text_efc9.text: Watch now ›

text_5e35.text: See how this travel leader reduced marketing efforts by 40% by getting a detailed look at their campaign performance.

text_35a7.text: Learn more ›

text_a9b4.text: Customer experiences matter. Which means your DMP matters.

text_301e.text: See why we are a Leader in The Forrester Wave™: Data Management Platforms, Q2 2017.

text_7141.text: Learn how to solve business problems.

text_e679.text: Read our use cases for best practices in Audience Manager.

text_b371.text: Define your audience ›

text_6b2a.text: Grow audiences with customer intelligence ›

text_48ef.text: Efficiently reach your target audience ›

text_b4ea.text: Welcome to a new enablement program to help customers get the most of our Adobe Experience Cloud — with guided learning, one-to-one expert support, and access to a thriving community.
